definition: to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
to unload/to unhitch/to remove or strip/to get rid of

sentences.english: Remove the green sensor from the airbox.
In addition, split type teaching model can let students to remove.
sentences.chinese: 另外，分體式教學模型可以讓學生拆卸。

sentences.english: Remove bolts holding shift lever to transmission.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸將排擋杆固定到變速箱的螺栓。

sentences.english: Design for Disassembly and Recycling (DFD&R) is the important content of Green Design.
sentences.chinese: 面向拆卸與回收的設計是綠色設計的重要內容。

sentences.english: Remove spring clip securing bulb to fog lamp .
sentences.chinese: 拆卸用以固定燈泡至霧燈的彈簧夾子。

sentences.english: The machines were dismounted for shipping.
sentences.chinese: 這些機器被拆卸下來以便裝運。

sentences.english: The table is so made that it easily pugs apart.
sentences.chinese: 這張桌子做得便於拆卸。

sentences.english: Removable CF die cast rear subframe is light and strong.
sentences.chinese: 壓鑄後方可拆卸CF卡是重量輕，強度副車架。

sentences.english: Glyph of Preparation: This glyph resetting the cooldown on dismantle is questionable at best.
sentences.chinese: 預備雕文能重置拆卸是有很大問題的。

sentences.english: Remove the upper flywheel and converter housing bolts and loosen the bottom bolts.
sentences.chinese: 拆卸上部飛輪及轉換器外殼螺栓，擰鬆底部螺栓。

sentences.english: It will be the biggest temporary indoor theatre in the Expo site. Its components can also be easily dissembled and rebuilt at another location.
sentences.chinese: 這一臨時劇場的另一特點就是可拆卸和遷移。

sentences.english: The removable seal on the door can be cleaned and replaced.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸門封條，隨意更換，便於清潔。

sentences.english: Does not have detachable pieces that can lodge in the windpipe, ears, or nostrils.
sentences.chinese: 沒有可拆卸的片斷，可以向在氣管，耳朵，或鼻孔。

sentences.english: Removable PU foam insole may help accommodate a personal orthotic.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸的聚氨酯泡沫鞋墊可以幫助容納個人的矯正。

sentences.english: Disassembly of wornout or malfunctioning products is a principal matter during the green remanufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 廢棄產品的拆卸回收是綠色再製造的中心問題。

sentences.english: Shed can be used throughout the climb has been hanging electric hoist to the ground and then demolished.
sentences.chinese: 整個爬棚可以用電動葫蘆一直吊到地面再拆卸。

definition: bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
nut (female component of nut and bolt)
